inclusion.criterion: Estimated life expectancy of at least 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 10% or more loss of vertebrae height
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate organ and marrow function as defined below:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: International normalized ratio (INR)/ prothrombin time (PT) within normal institutional limits
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin within normal institutional limits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have had prior external beam radiotherapy or surgery in the area of planned intervention
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous radiopharmaceuticals (i.e, Ra-222, Sr-90, etc) within 30 days of procedure
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with clinical or radiographic evidence of spinal cord or cauda equine compression or effacement
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and has undergone radiation therapy. However, the patient's overall condition and medical history suggest that they may not be eligible for this trial.
